message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $115. I believe this price reflects the value you'll receive and I'm confident it will be acceptable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but your price is a little high for me. Would you consider $90?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, and I'd like to propose an alternative. How about we meet in the middle at $105 for the product? This respects your budget while still reflecting the value of the product.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  To be honest, $100 is the highest I can go. If you're willing to work with that, I'm ready to buy.
